column7: Citywide Over Time and Top 10 Cities unemployment estimates use more recent data from the Bureau of Labor Statistics 2014. This source was not available for estimates by Planning District and Racial Disparity. Planning District and Racial Disparity estimates were based on 2009-2013 American Community Survey data.
column8: Percentage of population, 16 years or older, who are unemployed but seeking work.

column2: Child mortality rate per 100,000, <18 years of age
column5: Vital Statistics for Philadelphia, Pennsylvania Department of Health
column8: Age-adjusted mortality rate per 100,000 children under 18.

column2: Ambulatory care sensitive hospitalization rate per 100,000
column5: Pennsylvania Health Care Cost Containment Council
column8: Age-adjusted rate per 100,000 persons for conditions where appropriate ambulatory care prevents or reduces the need for admission to the hospital, for population under 75 years of age.

column2: Children with dental visit in past year, 3-17 years of age
column5: Public Health Management Corporation (PHMC) Household Health Survey
column8: Percentage of children, age 3-17 years, for whom adult proxy reported dental visit in past 12 months.

column5: Vital Statistics for Philadelphia, Pennsylvania Department of Health
column8: Age-adjusted rate of cancer deaths per 100,000 persons.

column5: Air Management Services, Philadelphia Department of Public Health
column8: Number of days of the year with Air Quality Index (AQI) levels of 0-50, wherein air quality is considered satisfactory and air pollution poses little or no risk. AQI is a scale from 0 to 500, reflecting measures of ground-level ozone, particulate matter, carbon monoxide, sulfur dioxide, and nitrogen dioxide pose little or no risk. The reporting is based on 2013 Environmental Protection Agency standards.

column5: Vital Statistics for Philadelphia, Pennsylvania Department of Health
column8: Age-adjusted rate of homicide deaths per 100,000 persons.

column5: Vital Statistics for Philadelphia, Pennsylvania Department of Health
column8: Age-adjusted rate of deaths by intentional self-harm per 100,000 persons.
